lead_paragraph: The paper-product company is introducing a new line that incorporates bamboo and straw, which it hopes will be a rapidly renewable source of fiber.

headline.main: Kimberly-Clark Makes Bet on Bamboo and Straw
headline.print_headline: Kimberly-Clark Makes Bet on Bamboo and Straw

snippet: The paper-product company is introducing a new line that incorporates bamboo and straw, which it hopes will be a rapidly renewable source of fiber.
